message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that could be incredibly valuable for your business. While I can't disclose the exact details just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1000000 to me.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This is a significant discount considering its potential value. If you're interested, I'd be happy to share more information and answer any questions you may have. Please let me know your decision.
